attributes.action: acknowledge the significance of September 19th, "International Talk Like A Pirate Day"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the mid 90's people all over the world have been remembering pirates on this day by mimicking their speech and wearing patches and the like. I think it would be rather excellent if the goverment would also celebrate this day in the same fashion whilst going about their normal political lives. MAKE POLITICS FUN!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
